description: This file defines the main page component for a React-based TicTacToe game UI, including game state management, user interactions, and rendering of UI components such as Board, StatusBar, and Controls.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React component function that manages game state, handles user interactions, and renders the UI for the TicTacToe game.

methods.name: handleSquareClick
methods.description: Handles user clicks on a game square, performs validation, updates state, and logs the move.

methods.name: handleReset
methods.description: Resets the game board to the initial state.

methods.name: handleNewGame
methods.description: Starts a new game with initial settings, resetting state and logging the event.
